mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (pcno, bno, comment, commenter, c_regdate) VALUES (#{pcno},#{bno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_comment WHERE cno = #{cno} AND commenter = #{commenter}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_comment SET comment = #{comment}, c_updatedate = current_timestamp() WHERE cno = #{cno} AND commenter = #{commenter}
